      (package private) void BPOfferService.registrationSucceeded(BPServiceActor bpServiceActor, DatanodeRegistration reg)
      After one of the BPServiceActors registers successfully with the NN, it calls this function to verify that the NN it connected to is consistent with other NNs serving the block-pool.

      Called when an actor shuts down.
      (package private) void BPOfferService.updateActorStatesFromHeartbeat(BPServiceActor actor, NNHAStatusHeartbeat nnHaState)
      Update the BPOS's view of which NN is active, based on a heartbeat response from one of the actors.
